data.name: Stay put, GOG nav-bar!
data.description: Keeps GOG.com's main nav-bar at the top and prevents it from following you down pages as you browse. Fully compatible with Barefoot Essentials.

user.name: Eli S. Clemens
user.about: If you'd like to contact me and you have an account with UserStyles.org, you can always send me a private message by clicking the link directly below this section. If you don't have an account here, however, but you do happen to be a GOG.com user like me (a fellow GOGer), you can also contact me for any reason via GOG's super-useful, super-easy messaging system. Simply click here to go to an old post of mine on GOG's community forums, and then move your cursor over my name or image on the left of the post to open the user info menu and click "start conversation".
